caption.p: LM and SEM images of L. monocytogenes strain #80466 grown in presence of the C. sativa EO. (A) LM images after staining with Flagella Stain Droppers (magnification: 1000 ×; bar, 5 μm): flagella are stained in pink red; (B) SEM images (bar, 1 μm). Insert, “ bouquet” of listeriae. CTR, control ( L. monocytogenes strain grown in the absence of EO).
